"A.P.241/4/22/11:00": "As you've all seen it... this is the current state of the moon."
"And this is a telescopic picture of the colored part."
"That's gross... Are you saying those are all ESC-A Darkers?"
"Needless to say, it looks like they're trying to make a \"road\" down to Earth."
"If they arrived in such numbers... we wouldn't be able to handle it."
"Even for ARKS, fighting all those is... It's gotten to the point where putting the entire planet in an isolation field wouldn't be enough."
"To think they're endlessly spawning like that... Mother was saying she wasn't used to it yet. But this..."
"If their spawn point is centered on the moon, then Mother herself is also on the moon. Is that correct, Ms. Kohri?"
"Uh, um, I think. My memories are a bit blurry, but I think I was on the moon."
"Even so, the place where we went to rescue Hitsugi should have been destroyed... along with those two girls."
"Um... The place where Hitsugi was at was formerly used during the moon development and abandoned afterwards."
"The place Mother is at was created specifically for Mother... so it's a completely different place."
"Is that so? There seems to be an inconsistency with Earth Guide's information."
"Uh, but... I did seem to have a screw loose. I guess I could be wrong... Uhm, well... I'm sorry!"
"Why are you apologizing? I'm just complaining about how unreliable intelligence from Earth Guide can be. Your intel has nothing to do with it."
"Besides, there are other people you should be apologizing to."
"Oh... Uhm, I know I'm late, but... I've caused so much trouble for all of you in ARKS..."
"Unfortunately, all I can do is apologize, and apologize, and apologize, and apologize, and keep on apologizing!"
"No, no, Ms. Kohri was being controlled. There's no need to let it bother you so much."
"No, that's no good! If there's anything I can do, I'll do it! Just say the world! I'll obey you!"
"Even if you tell me that... I said..."
"I know! <%me>! I'll let <%me> deal with you! I'm counting on you!"
"Just say the word! Shall I take responsibility and impale myself to regain my honor? Although... I don't want to feel that much pain, so maybe an assisted suicide would be better?"
"Or maybe one of those? Like a maid? The one who takes care of all the chores and such. The one who gets punished when there's a speck of dust on the floor in the corner of the room."
"Ah! Or maybe, just maybe, pay with my body...? If you tell me to strip down right here... If that is your wish... I'll obey your orders!"
"But, but, but! That's, that's very embarressing so... uhm... Please Hitsugi... don't watch me!"
"...She seems very similar to how Ms. Hitsugi was when she first arrived."
"...Don't remind me."
"<%me>. If you don't tell her something, there'll be no end to her delusions."
"1. No apologies allowed"
"2. Give Hitsugi your full support"
"What?! What do you mean apologies aren't allowed?! So, you're saying I should strip down for you? ...Wait, that's not what you meant?"
"You want me to support Hitsugi...? Of course I would, of course!"
"What they mean is, stop worrying about the little things and devote yourself to supporting Hitsugi as a friend."
"If not, my stupid little sister is prone to unpredictable rampages. She needs to have brakes close by."
"...Hitsugi. Um... Is it okay for me to help? What if I do something strange and cause more problems..."
"Kohri!"
"Y-Yes?!"
"I'm going to stop Mother, and save Aru. I'm going to fight more than ever before... so keep up with me, okay?"
"...Yes. Yes, yes!"
"Now then, the location, target, and goal have all been decided. Preparations will soon be complete."
"I'm sure this will be a rough battle, so be sure to save your strength. When preparations are completed, I'll call you."
